contactinfo: You can call us on our Toll Free Numbers at 1800 890 6027, 1800 270 1280 available from 8 AM to 6 PM on all days Including Sundays and public holidays Connect to us via WhatsApp on 7617770113 For more, email us at admissions@gehu.ac.in or enquiry@gehu.ac.in

    -MHM (Master of Hotel Management)

jokes: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
Why did the computer catch a cold? It left its Windows open!
Why did the math book look sad? Because it had too many problems.
What do you call fake spaghetti? An impasta!
Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts!
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
What do you call cheese that isn't yours? Nacho cheese!
Why did the bicycle fall over? Because it was two-tired!
What's orange and sounds like a parrot? A carrot!
How do you organize a space party? You planet!
Why don't seagulls fly over the bay? Because then they'd be bagels!
What did the janitor say when he jumped out of the closet? Supplies!
What did the grape say when it got stepped on? Nothing, it just let out a little wine.
Why did the math book look sad? Because it had too many problems.
What do you call a fish wearing a crown? A kingfish!
Why did the computer catch a cold? It left its Windows open!
Why did the chicken go to the seance? To talk to the other side!
Why did the skeleton go to the party alone? He had nobody to go with him!
What did the ocean say to the shore? Nothing, it just waved!
What do you call a snowman with a six-pack? An abdominal snowman!

Indulge in a secure and comfortable college life with our excellent hostel facilities. Tailored for female students, our accommodations boast 100% security. Choose from a variety of rooms, including AC and non-AC options, based on your preferences. Enjoy wholesome meals at the hostel mess. Plus, all our hostels are conveniently located within 500 meters from the campus, ensuring easy access to academic and recreational spaces. Your ideal college living experience awaits!

syllabus: Upon enrollment, students are provided with the timetable and syllabus directly. If you need extra copies of either the syllabus or timetable, we encourage you to visit http://btechcsegehu.in/syllabus/
library: The college boasts two well-equipped libraries, one catering specifically to law students and another serving the rest of the student body. These spacious libraries have the capacity to comfortably accommodate up to 250 students simultaneously, providing a conducive environment for studying and research. Students have the privilege of borrowing books from an extensive and diverse collection, allowing them to enhance their knowledge across various subjects. These libraries serve as invaluable resources, fostering a culture of continuous learning and academic excellence among the student community.

The college features two extensively equipped libraries, with one dedicated to law students and the other serving the broader student population. These roomy facilities can conveniently host up to 250 students concurrently, creating an ideal setting for both study and research activities. Students enjoy the opportunity to borrow books from a broad and varied collection, enabling them to enrich their understanding of diverse subjects. These libraries play a crucial role as invaluable assets, nurturing a culture of ongoing learning and academic achievement within the student community

The college's commitment to academic excellence is evident through its two well-appointed libraries—one exclusively for law students and the other catering to the wider student body. These spacious facilities, capable of accommodating up to 250 students simultaneously, provide an optimal environment for study and research. Students, benefiting from access to a diverse range of books, have the chance to deepen their knowledge across various subjects. These libraries are indispensable assets, fostering a culture of continuous learning and academic accomplishment among the student community.
exam: At the commencement of each semester, the college provides the academic calendar. All examinations are scheduled in accordance with this calendar. To access the academic calendar for the current semester, please visit the following link:https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/imageuploadingtester.appspot.com/o/images%2FAcademic%20Calendar%20for%20III%20V%20VII%20and%20IX%20Semester182%20(2).pdf?alt=media&token=e2e24f16-293b-4a4b-baae-68e1e9e0813b. Stay informed and plan your academic journey effectively with our comprehensive academic calendar.
placements: Graphic Era has been delivering the Highest Number of Tier-1 Placements in the region, Year on Year, for the past many years with the maximum number of selection in Global Giants like Amazon, Adobe, Microsoft and Google. To know more visit https://dehradun.gehu.ac.in/placements/
scholarship:
Our college offers multiple scholarships:
   -Academic scholarship(minimum 70% required and differ from course to course)
   -Fee Concession For Wards Of Defence Personnel (5% On Net Tuition Fee)
   -Fee Concession For Female Candidates (10% On Net Tuition Fee)
   -Loyalty Concession: 10% (On Net Tuition Fee)
   -Sibling Concession: (7.5% - Current Student and 5% - Alumni on NET TUITION FEE)
   -Scholarship to students of Uttarakhand.
uniform:
Dress Code:
   -Monday & Thursday:Prescribed Formal Uniform with proper tie,belt and formal black shoes.
   -Tuesday,Wednesday & Friday: Semi-formals with university T-shirt/Hoodies.
   -Saturday:Samrt Casual(no torn jeans or shorts are allowed).
   -Students should be in possession of University ID card with them at all times.
